title: CENTX - custom? sans
content:
Can anyone ID this font, or is it custom?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [centx.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604052145/http:/typophile.com/files/centx.jpg) | 8.77 KB |
author: evan

comments.content: Nice font, but too many differences. Any other takers?
I think this is [Eurostile](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604052145/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/efscangraphic/eurostile-sb/bold-ext/testdrive.html?s=CENTXG&p=72) with a bit of customization.
